name: Himalaya Diabecon DS Tablet 60's
description: Himalaya diabecon DS tablet helps in the management of diabetes. It is a formulation of an ayurvedic medicine, which has antidiabetic properties. Gymnema, Indian kino tree, shilajeet plays a vital role. Gymnema helps reduce excessive sugar, and also has a regenerative effect on pancreatic beta cells which stimulates the activity of insulin production. Also, increases the enzyme activity that is responsible for glucose absorption; while Indian kino tree is fortified with alpha-glucosidase properties that aids in regularizing key metabolic enzymes that’s involved in carbohydrate metabolism. Shilajeet helps decreases hepatic glucose production and prevents hyperglycemia and offers a protective action on b-cells of the pancreas and helps promote unrestricted endogenous insulin action.
key_benefits: Increases enzyme activity responsible for glucose absorption
directions_for_usage: Consult your physician to prescribe the dosage
safety_information: This product is not intended to diagnose treat, cure or prevent any disease
Keep out of reach of children
Discontinue use if you notice any side effects or allergic reaction
Store in a cool dry place
Not for medicinal use
Keep bottle tightly closed
Do not exceed the recommended daily usage
Children under 12 years of age, pregnant or lactating women or anyone with a medical condition should consult with a physician before using this product
Read all the labelled warnings before use

name: Aimil BGR-34 Tablet 100's
description: Aimil BGR is a comprehensive formula enriched with natural botanical extracts for effective carbohydrate metabolism. Contributes to the maintenance of effective carbohydrate metabolism and restores quality of life. It also reduces the chances of long-term complications. Its active ingredients are rich in flavonoids, strengthens the cells and one of the best sources of micro-nutrients. Methika in it nourishes and tones the vital organs. Giloy is a unique herb that improves immunity and helps improve resistance to infections.
directions_for_usage: Take 2 tablets twice a day, half an hour before meals or as directed by the physician
safety_information: Read instructions carefully before use

name: Aimil Amree Plus Capsule 20's
description: Amree plus is outcome of marvellous R&D efforts, bringing revolution in establishing a formulation to restore altered carbohydrate metabolism & its associated complications.
key_benefits: Checks over fatigue, excessive thirst & urination.
directions_for_usage: In mild conditions: Capsules: 2 Cap. Twice a day or as directed by the physician for varying severity conditions. (Should be taken 20-30 minutes before meals)
safety_information: Take 2 tablets twice or thrice a day or use as directed by the physician

name: Cresvin Beta Tablet 10'S
description: Cresin beta is capable of regenerating beta cells that help prevent and fights diabetes. Its active ingredients treat the root cause of diabetes and help control blood sugar. It enhances endogenous antioxidant and repair systems and activates the endogenous stress response system. Inhibits amylase and alpha-glucosidase to reduce hyperglycemia.
directions_for_usage: Take 1 – 2 tablets twice a day or as directed by your physician
safety_information: Read instructions carefully before use

key_benefits: Reduces acne and effective against skin ailments
Helps curing cough, cold and asthma
directions_for_usage: Drink 50 ml of juice mixed with a glass of water twice a day to reap the long-term benefits of natural therapy.

name: Sri Sri Tattva Mehantaka Vati 1000 mg Tablet 60's
description: Mehentaka Vati - Diabetes is a disease that was known in India since ancient times. Ayurvedic saints had a thorough knowledge of the disease and have identified and used innumerable medications to manage the condition. Mehentaka Vati is a combination of 15 ayurvedic drugs, which are well known for their anti-diabetic activity since times immemorial.
directions_for_usage: 2 tablets twice or thrice a day before food or as directed by the physician.

name: Himalaya Karela Tablet 60's
description: Himalaya Karela is reported to contain constituents that act like insulin to help reduce blood sugar levels and support the restoration of functional pancreatic beta cells that secrete insulin in the body and helps maintain healthy glucose levels.
key_benefits: By overcoming the resistance to insulin, it promotes healthy glucose utilization by the body’s tissues.
Antioxidant properties help scavenge cell-damaging effects of free radicals and reduce the risk of glucose instability complications.
directions_for_usage: 1-2 tablets twice daily or as directed by your physician.

name: Paracip 500mg Tablet 10'S
description: PARACIP 500MG TABLET contains Paracetamol which belongs to the group of medicines called Analgesics and Antipyretics. It is used to relieve mild to moderate pain (including headaches, backache, toothache, severe nerve pain, sore throat, period pain, low back and leg pain, muscle pain.
key_benefits: Relieves mild to moderate pain (such as headache, toothache, joint pain). Lowers fever and relieves the symptoms of cold or flu.
directions_for_usage: Take PARACIP 500MG TABLET as advised by your physician. It can be taken with or without food. For Tablet, Capsule: Swallow PARACIP 500MG TABLET with a glass of water. Do not crush or chew the medicine. For Dispersible Tablet: Disperse the medicine in the specified quantity of water as mentioned on the label. Consume the medicine immediately after reconstitution. Your doctor will decide the correct dose and duration of therapy for you depending upon your age, body weight and severity of the condition.
safety_information: PARACIP 500MG TABLET should be used with caution in pregnant women only if considered clearly necessary. Your doctor may use the lowest possible dose to reduce the pain and fever only for a shorter duration in pregnant women. Consult your doctor before taking PARACIP 500MG TABLET.
other_information: Keep PARACIP 500MG TABLET out of reach of children

name: Saridon Advance Tablets for 5 in 1 Pain Relief 10's
description: Saridon Advance, new formula for severe headache from Saridon, India's no.1 Headache Specialist. Saridon Advance helps to provide effective relief from pain, severe headache, migraine, toothache and body pains. Starts action in 5 minutes and gives quick pain relief
key_benefits: Effective relief from Severe Headache. Pain relief with just one tablet. New formula from Saridon. India's number 1 Headache Specialist. Easy to swallow tablets. Quick action, starts releasing in 5 minutes
directions_for_usage: Swallow the tablet with water. Take one tablet daily or as directed by physician
safety_information: Pregnancy Warning: Doses such as those of Vitamin A contained in Supradyn should be avoided during early pregnancy unless correction of Vitamin A deficiency is required. name: COLDACT NEW Capsule 20's
description: COLDOVER ORAL DROPS is a combination of Phenylephrine and Chlorpheniramine which belongs to the group of medicines called Nasal decongestants and Antihistamines respectively. It is used to relieve nasal and sinus congestion.
key_benefits: Relieves nasal and sinus congestion. Relieves allergic symptoms of the nose or throat due to upper respiratory tract allergies. Relieves sinus pain and headache. Used adjunctly with antibacterials to treat sinusitis, tonsillitis and otitis media.
directions_for_usage: Give COLDOVER ORAL DROPS to your child as advised by the physician. Shake well before use. Use a measuring cup to properly measure the dose. Your child’s doctor will decide the correct dose and duration of COLDOVER ORAL DROPS for your child depending upon child’s age, body weight and disease condition.
safety_information: Drowsiness and sedation. Disturbance in concentrating, un-coordination, dizziness, headache. Blurred vision. Nausea or vomiting. Dry mouth. Tiredness.
other_information: COLDOVER ORAL DROPS is not recommended for use in pregnant women as it is used only in children.

name: Benadryl Cough Formula Syrup 150ml
description: It is used for the temporary relief of the symptoms of coughs and cold. Helps to ease non-productive coughs, nasal and chest congestion, sneezing and runny nose associated with the common cold and itchy and watery eyes
key_benefits: It relieves from the severe cough.
directions_for_usage: Always take this medicine exactly as your doctor has told you. Shake well before use.
safety_information: Dizziness, drowsiness. Euphoria. Nervousness. Insomnia. Tremors. Blurred vision. Skin rashes. Dry mouth. Nausea and vomiting. Stomach pain. Diarrhoea. Urinary difficulty and retention. Constipation.
